amendment.description: To appropriately address the use of amici curiae in Foreign Intelligence Surveillance Court proceedings and to require adequate disclosure of relevant information in Foreign Intelligence Surveillance Act of 1978 applications.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1840 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 40 - 53. Record Vote Number: 149.

action.text: Amendment SA 1840 proposed by Senator Lee.
